nodes.name: ReadJSON
nodes.description: Dataset Node for reading JSON files
nodes.details:
It reads in JSON files. Each JSON record has to be on a separate line for Spark to handle it correctly.

There cannot be line break within a record.

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to Schema tab and Refresh the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT created_at,
 		customer_number,
        invoice_number,
        last_modified_at,
        order_created_at,
        order_number,
        retailer,
        sales_channel,
        ex_items.order_item_id as order_item_id,
        ex_items.article_name as article_name,
        ex_items.article_size as article_size,
        ex_items.config_sku as config_sku,
        ex_items.simple_sku as simple_sku,
        ex_items.sources as sources,
        ex_items.tax_rate as tax_rate,
        ex_items.type as type,
        ex_items.destination_country_code as destination_country_code,
        ex_items.gross_discount.amount as gross_discount_amount,
        ex_items.gross_discount.currency as gross_discount_currency,
        ex_items.gross_discounted_price.amount as gross_discounted_price_amount,
        ex_items.gross_discounted_price.currency as gross_discounted_price_currency,
        ex_items.gross_retail_price.amount as gross_retail_price_amount,
        ex_items.gross_retail_price.currency as gross_retail_price_currency,
        ex_items.suggested_retail_price.amount as suggested_retail_price_amount,
        ex_items.suggested_retail_price.currency as suggested_retail_price_currency,
        ex_items.tax.amount as tax_amount,
         ex_items.tax.currency as tax_currency,
        ex_items.shipped_at as shipped_at,
        ex_items.shipping_number as shipping_number,
        ex_items.tax_rate as tax_rate
  FROM (SELECT b.*,
         explode(items) as ex_items
         FROM fire_temp_table b)tmp
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT customer_number, 
       order_number,
       retailer,
       sales_channel,
       ex_items.cancellation_reason as cancellation_reason,
       ex_items.id as id,
       ex_items.status as status
FROM( SELECT customer_number, 
               order_number,
               retailer,
               sales_channel, 
               explode(items) as ex_items
         FROM fire_temp_table1
    )tmp

nodes.name: JoinUsingSQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT p.*,
       q.cancellation_reason 
       FROM tempTable1 p JOIN tempTable2 q 
 ON(p.order_number = q.order_number and p.order_item_id = q.id)
